New Records: Jackson Chourio hit two home runs, including a tiebreaking HR in the 8th inning; Garrett Mitchell delivered a two-run shot in the 9th inning
Key Match Events: Chourio's second home run tied the game in the 8th inning; Mitchell's two-run HR in the 9th inning secured the win; Brewers' pitching held Mets to 3 runs over 9 innings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at American Family Field with an attendance of 40,350
Others: Umpires: Chris Segal (home plate), Vic Carapazza (first base), Alan Porter (second base), Mike Estabrook (third base), Brennan Miller (left field), Alex Tosi (right field); Game time: 2:43 PM
